name: 12 hours a slave
description:
This game was made for a game jam called “$101 Adventure Game Challenge” (https://itch.io/jam/101-adventure-challenge)

The jam lasted for two weeks, and the theme was “Historical Fiction”.

CONTROLS

  • Left click: Look
  • Right click: Interact
  • ESC: Skip cutscene

KNOWN ISSUES

  • The game doesn't work in full screen on some systems. If you get a black/blue unresponsive screen, please try to switch to windows mode

WALKTHROUGH

If you're stuck, you can find the full walkthrough for the game at this link: https://pastebin.com/8n3cwei5
